meeting_annotations.speaker: Jarad Mason
meeting_annotations.transcript: Yeah, I think self-healing is really hard for porous materials because as Joan kind of indicated, nearly every porous material is kinetically meta stable. meeting_annotations.speaker: Jarad Mason
meeting_annotations.transcript: And so once you collapse or degrade into a denser structure or have some sort of reaction then that can be kind of hard to reverse.
